name: koa-livereactload-boilerplate
description: Couldn't find a decent boilerplate so extended a livereactload example to use koa

scripts.build:prod: browserify src/frontend/clientEntryPoint.js -t babelify -g envify -g uglifyify > dist/bundle.js
scripts.bundle:prod: npm run env:production && npm run build:prod
scripts.watch: npm run env:development & npm run watch:server & npm run watch:frontend & wait
scripts.watch:frontend: node_modules/.bin/watchify src/frontend/clientEntryPoint.js -v -t babelify -g envify -p livereactload -o dist/bundle.js

author: Delaney Gillilan
